meanings.definition: The quality of being easily carried or moved.
meanings.sent1: The backpack's portability made it convenient for the hiker to carry all his gear.
meanings.sent2: The suitcase's portability allowed the traveler to easily move it around the airport.
meanings.sent3: The portability of the tiny umbrella made everyone laugh as it was carried by a strong gust of wind.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity had a portability that could travel across any artistic medium effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The portability of the folding chair made it a favorite for outdoor events.

meanings.definition: The ability of a software application to be used on different devices or operating systems.
meanings.sent1: The app developer ensured the portability of the game so it could be played on various smartphones.
meanings.sent2: The portability of the software allowed users to seamlessly switch between their laptop and tablet.
meanings.sent3: The portability of the program was so good that it could even run on a toaster!
meanings.sent4: The portability of the code was like a chameleon, adapting to any system it encountered.
meanings.sent5: The portability of the application made it a top choice for tech-savvy individuals.
